Class VectorExtensions

Namespace
SimulationFramework

Provides small utility extensions onto the System.Numerics Vector types.

Deconstruct(Vector2, out float, out float)

Deconstructs this vector into its components.

public static void Deconstruct(this Vector2 vector, out float x, out float y)

Parameters

vector Vector2

The vector to deconstruct.

x float

The value of the vector's x component.

y float

The value of the vector's y component.

Deconstructs this vector into its components.

The vector to deconstruct.

The value of the vector's w component.

Normalized(Vector2)

Returns this vector with a length of 1.

When provided a zero-length vector, this method returns a zero-length vector, unlike Normalize(Vector2), which returns (NaN, NaN). 

public static Vector2 Normalized(this Vector2 vector)

Parameters

vector Vector2

Returns

Vector2

Normalized(Vector3)

Returns this vector with a length of 1.

When provided a zero-length vector, this method returns a zero-length vector, unlike Normalize(Vector3), which returns (NaN, NaN, NaN). 

public static Vector3 Normalized(this Vector3 vector)

Parameters

vector Vector3

Returns

Vector3

Normalized(Vector4)

Returns this vector with a length of 1.

When provided a zero-length vector, this method returns a zero-length vector, unlike Normalize(Vector4), which returns (NaN, NaN, NaN, NaN). 

public static Vector4 Normalized(this Vector4 vector)
